GrammarIllustrator

Class GroupingStructureIllustrator

  • java.lang.Object
    • GrammarIllustrator.GroupingStructureIllustrator

  • public class GroupingStructureIllustrator
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that is used to draw the grouping structure illustration.

    • Method Summary

      • draw

        public void draw(java.awt.Graphics g,
                 GrammarContainer grammar,
                 double mStartX,
                 double mStartY)
        draws the grouping structure to the given Graphics object in the given position
        Parameters:
        g - the Graphics object to draw the grouping structure illustration to
        grammar - the grammar structure to follow
        mStartX - the starting x position to draw the grouping structure
        mStartY - the starting y position to draw the grouping structure
